EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-10-05-TurboShot 2.(f)ES-2016-10-05-TurboShotProactiveSupport
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn About Proactive Support|Tips & Tricks & More
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings from Turbonomic, {{lead.First Name:default=}}
Here's your monthly dose of Turbonomic. Want to speak about your experience as a customer?
Sign up for a confidential Customer Feedback Interview <[[mailto:Murphy.Vandervelde@Turbonomic.com?Subject=Customer Feedback Interview]]> and receive a $25 Amazon Gift card! <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-turbonomic/turbonomic-proactive-support-why-use-it-and-how-to-turn-it-on??utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=10052016]]> <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3741?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=10052016#whatsHappening]]> <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3741?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=10052016#tipsTricks]]> Featured Customer Matt McColm & EDF-RE This month we are excited to feature Matt McColm from EDF-RE, the president of our first ever Turbonomic user group (SoCal). While his journey with Turbonomic started with him "avoiding us like the plague" he has turned into one of our biggest advocates and even had Customer Video <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/turbonomic-customer-success-story-edf-renewable-energy/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=10052016]]> release last month. Matt's story is a powerful one and we are happy he gave us a second chance! Read More » <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3741?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=10052016#featuredCustomer]]> Featured Technology Microsoft Azure: What is it and why does Real Madrid swear by it Cloud, seldom does an IT buzz word take on such a popular and misunderstood place in mainstream society. With everybody singing the praises of Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure tends to be thought of as a distanct second. With Microsoft's on-premise presence, wide offering of cloud services and unbeleiveable customer rolodex (incluidng Real Madrid) they are the fastest growing public cloud provider. Read More » <[[https://turbonomic.com/blog/on-technology/what-is-microsoft-azure-and-why-has-real-madrid-bet-its-future-on-it/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=customer-newsletter&utm_content=10052016#featuredTech]]>
How likely are you to recommend Turbonomic to a colleague?
